section.p: Convert to External Entity Dialog allows you to convert a selected document portion to a new external entity. To call this dialog make a selection in the document and click Entity->Convert to External Entity .

Insert the new entity name and new file name (or Browse... to choose a file). Click OK. If an entity with the same name does not already exist, a new external entity will be created from the selected document portion.

note.p: To convert the document portion back from an external entity use the Convert from Entity command ( Entity Convert from Entity).
